channel.title: Blog on Nico Einsidler.
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Nico Einsidler.

item.title: First redesign of my homepage since 2012
item.description: It’s been almost 10 years since my last homepage redesign. Well, I’ve been very busy… But it’s finally here now. For nostalgia’s sake, let’s look back on all the old revisions and designs.
